extensionDescription.message: Enhance your Thunderbird inbox with automated profile images, adding company logos or avatars to emails and contacts while supporting BIMI

contactsIntegrationLabel.message: Auto add profile picture when saving a contact
contactsIntegrationLabel.description: Label for the contacts integration checkbox.

inboxListLabel.description: Label for the inbox list checkbox.

inboxListDescription.message: Enable this option to show profile pictures in the inbox list.
inboxListDescription.description: Description for the inbox list feature.

inboxListWarning.message: Warning: This feature is experimental and may not work as expected. If you encounter any issues, please disable this option and report the issue.
inboxListWarning.description: Warning message for the inbox list feature.

inboxListKnownIssues.description: Header for the known issues list.

inboxListIssueSlowFirstLoad.description: Known issue: Slow during the first load.

inboxListIssueBigFolders.description: Known issue: Struggles with big folders.

cacheSizeLabel.description: Label for the cache size display.

clearCacheButton.description: Label for the clear cache button.

cacheCleared.description: Message displayed when the cache is cleared.

profilePictureNotFound.description: Message displayed when the profile picture is not found.

emailInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the email input field.

noIcons.description: Count displayed when no icons are stored in cache.

oneIcon.description: Count displayed when 1 icon is stored in cache.

multipleIcons.description: Count displayed when multiple icons are stored in cache.
